content: BITULINE® is a waterproofing layer in the form of a bitumen sheet which is equipped with reinforcing fiber made from Polyester and Polymer layers so that it has resistance to internal and external applications. It is applied by burning with a gas torch, BITULINE® can be applied on flat or sloping roofs on concrete decks, terraces, basement surfaces and swimming pools.
flexibility: Flexibility : Does not break when bent
